name: WHY WONT YOU LOVE ME
description:
Welcome To Why WONT YOU LOVE ME

The game is about A visual Story, where you need to pick an event, where you need to pick, something, everytime you pick an option, you will miss any a character or an event, EVERYTIME YOU PICK AN EVENT, YOU LOOSE CHANCE, WILL YOU FIND WHOS THE KILLER?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the Version 0.0.0.0.3.1E

You might be questioning, Why the f, the version name looks like a spam of zeros and one?  Well I make this game to establish a simple yet, horror games, Online, More update soon.... I will talk about what is the new updates for this game

{--------------UPDATES------------------}  

1.  Remove the bug, in the end of the game...

2. Remove the cut in the game

3. added more story

{---------------FAQ-------------------}

Q: How can i help to this game?
A: Its easy Join here in our discord https://discord.gg/BMGXzsn , or suggest a feature or report a bug or donate a game resources

Q: Do i need a Window 10 to run this game
A: Well I currently dont know if you can run this in window 7, but window 8 certainly can, though, there will be alot of bug in windows 8, cause there are some stuff, that isnt availabke in 8 but available in 10

Q: What is the hardware or pc hardware do you need?
A: I think you can play it in any hardware or pc, cause im using an intel celeron CPU, and it doesnt lag that much, so i think it can run it

Q: When will be the official release of this game?
A: Its seems easy to you, but for me not, this game is a large game, that requires 2-3 members, ranging from coding, Storyline, EASTEREGGS, and more, This doesnt fit in my schedule that much due to, ONLINE SCHOOL, MY LIFE, SOCIALS, AND YOUTUBE... in estimated time will not be confirmed

Q: Is this contain virus or something?
A: Good question, actually, this dont have malware or trojan, This is made in RENPY game engine, This is a small python game, even if you use the Avast antivirus, if your antivirus says its a virus, its probably installed in a wrong website or something...

Q: Where do i install this
A: Well, you can install the game here... or install in gamejolt

Q: Why do the game says, MEDIEVAL ENTERTAINMENT PRESENT, But you develop it?
A: its my old username, no need to explain :)

[---------------HOW CAN I ASK?--------------------]

Well, easy, just comment down, i will answer it, as fast as possible, when im awake of course, im on philippines, so i might be late
